title: Wink Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, hey, Umi. Teach me how to wink~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh!? Didn’t you wink at your live the other day? I thought you could do it well enough already....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No no no, it’s nothing compared to you, Umi~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m not really.... an expert at winking either, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But you alllways wink and throw kisses on PVs! That got me like, BANG, you know~? Ai also wants to be able to do something like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, tha-, that’s because they’re PVs! Besides, umm.... doing it here right now would be quite embarrassing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>So you’re fine with doing it through a screen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Well, if we do it like that, it won’t be too bad....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay! Ai will take a video then! Come on, wink at the camera~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wha-, I never said that I’ll do it now, wait, Ai~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
